Description:
---------------
Wakka. Wakka. Wakka. The "Pac" has returned to celebrate her 30th birthday party with Pac-Man. The game combines traditional elements of the franchise with the sensitivity of multiplayer game to bring a dynamic society full of wacky mini-games and challenges. Using the Wii Remote, the game controls easy to pick-up-and-play "will have players using their skills and reflexes to compete against each other as they go on various game boards only virtual. Add a little retro flavor, PAC-MAN Party will also feature a classic mode where players can kick as it was the decade of 1980 and the experience of the original arcade versions of Pac-Man, Galaga and Dig Dug.
